body.name: Parodontax Active Gum Health Breath Freshener Mouthwash, 3 x 16.9 fl oz
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Wednesday, February 21 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35. Order within 6 hrs 26 mins
features: Three 16.9 fl oz Bottles Parodontax Active Gum Health Breath Freshener Mouthwash for healthy gums and fresh breath
Specially formulated to kill 99.9% of plaque bacteria that could lead to gum problems and bad breath
Forms an antibacterial shield to help prevent bad breath bacteria
Reaches vulnerable hard to reach areas
For best results, use daily as directed
Alcohol-free mouthwash formulated with Cetylpyridinium Chloride (CPC)
body.description: Enhance your gum care routine with Parodontax Active Gum Health Breath Freshener Mouthwash for healthy gums and fresh breath. It is specially formulated with Breath Cleanse Technology to kill 99.9 percent of plaque bacteria that could lead to gum problems and bad breath. This alcohol-free mouth wash reaches vulnerable hard to reach areas, helps prevent bleeding gums and helps reduce the early signs of gum disease. For best results, rinse with this antibacterial mouthwash daily after brushing your teeth. For healthy gums and teeth, enhance your dental care routine with Parodontax, the gum experts.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Has Cetylpyridinium Chloride which is better than ordinary mouthwash.
reviews.reviewText: 3 bottles of 500 ml each comes in the box. All tamper proof sealed. I use mouthwash a lot and have been using the 2 main brands - Colgate and Crest. Majority of them have fluoride as the main ingredient. Fluoride is found in all toothpaste. In particular I look for mouthwash that contains Cetylpyridinium Chloride. This bottle of Parodontax has it. CPC helps kill bacteria in the mouth that causes gum problems. All ingredients in mouthwashes and toothpaste have the aim of giving you a healthy mouth but those with CPC is a little better. This is alcohol free and tastes like mint.I'm in for anything that will keep my mouth healthy. Parodontax is as good as the other leading brands. Will recommend.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 11, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Better than the more popular name brands
reviews.reviewText: This Paradontax isn't as strong tasting as the Listerine Cool Mint and omits the lingering aftertaste of Crest Multi-Protection. It's closest to Colgate Total clean mint but with an even milder flavor, making it a great choice for a 'naturally-fresh' breath.The alcohol-free formula and child-proof (squeeze-side) cap are also plusses for households with kids. The only downside is the higher cost.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great for freshening up you breath!
reviews.reviewText: This mouth wash is great for in between brushing just to get freshened up and I suppose great for after you brush too for an added layer of cleaning those places your toothbrush or floss missed. You only get one set of teeth so take care of them! I love the taste and that it is alcohol free so it doesn't dry out my mouth. I used this about an hour ago and my mouth still feels fresh. Would recommend.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 11, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Has sucralose, which isn't ideal for me, but at least I don't swallow it. The flavor reminds me a bit of fireball candy with the cinnamon flavor. Leaves my mouth feeling clean.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Mild wintergreen flavor - no burning - may cause staining
reviews.reviewText: This mouthwash has a mild wintergreen flavor. I did not experience any burning sensation that accompanies some mouthwashes. As with some mouthwashes, the label on this product indicates it may cause staining. My spouse uses the Parodontax toothpaste, so I know this is a brand that we can trust. The price for the 3 pack at the time of my review is 12% cheaper than buying 3 individual bottles at another online retailer.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars The perfect companion to Parodontax toothpaste
reviews.reviewText: I have been using Parodontax toothpaste for a while to keep my gums healthy, but this is the first time I have seen mouthwash from the same company. It has a nice flavor and is alcohol free, so it doesn't burn your mouth like some brands do. I think this mouthwash goes well with the toothpaste and will help keep my gums in good shape so I can hopefully avoid extra trips to the dentist in the future. I plan to keep buying this mouthwash.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
reviews.reviewText: The Parodontax Active Gum Health Breath Freshener Mouthwash has a good taste. It’s not strong in flavor, but it’s very effective.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 10, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Gum health mouthwash 🪥
reviews.reviewText: I’ve been concerned about my gum health more and more as I get older. I was excited to find this gum health mouthwash. It’s very fresh and minty and my mouth and teeth feel very clean after using it. I love that it’s a brand that I trust, too.
